channel.title: Connection problems
channel.description:
Whenever I log into my server, then log out, and try to log back in, it rejects my connection. It'll show like [code] ClientHandler: Player Fr33b1e disconnected ClientHandler: connection accepted from CRAFTY-NUMBERS:NUMBERS ClientHandler: rejected connection from CRAFTY-NUMBERS: NUMBERS[/code]
I had a friend tell me that it might be a problem in my player or server.java.
Any help will be appreciated greatly.
